What does the Gotham City report say about Grifols?Shares in Grifols fell as much as over 40% on Tuesday, wiping $3.83 billion off its market value, after hedge fund Gotham City Research questioned its accounting, prompting the Spanish drugmaker to "categorically" deny any wrongdoing. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 19:20:28 GMT BK2LVWZ6ARCHJNG45MCJUQ2EWI https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/what-does-gotham-city-report-say-about-grifols-2024-01-09/Nell Mackenzie商业医疗保健与制药
Honda unveils plans for new EV lineupJapanese automaker Honda Motor announced on Tuesday plans to launch a new electric vehicle series from 2026, as it plays catch-up with global rivals in the shift to battery powered cars. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 19:04:35 GMT B7KOEWQY75MQ5DIUJX4G3MFCC4 https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/honda-unveils-plans-new-ev-lineup-2024-01-09/Reuters商业带电
World Bank forecasts 2024 global growth to slow for third consecutive yearThe World Bank warned on Tuesday that global growth in 2024 is set to slow for a third year in a row, prolonging poverty and debilitating debt levels in many developing countries. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 14:35:32 GMT WONLBIHCPVP2RKLP622CWTSE7A https://www.reuters.com/markets/world-bank-forecasts-2024-global-growth-slow-for-third-consecutive-year-2024-01-09/David Lawder市场宏观问题
US trade deficit shrinks in November on falling importsThe U.S. trade deficit unexpectedly narrowed in November as imports of consumer goods fell to a one-year low amid slowing domestic demand, a trend that, if it persists in December, could result in trade having no impact on economic growth in the fourth quarter. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 13:47:29 GMT 2PRUBGD7P5IONIFQBZN7VGXSVQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/us-trade-deficit-narrows-november-imports-fall-2024-01-09/Lucia Mutikani市场美国市场
Grifols to hold board meeting Tuesday afternoon after Gotham City reportSpanish pharmaceutical company Grifols is set to hold a board meeting on Tuesday afternoon in reaction to a report from Gotham City Research questioning the company's accounting released earlier, board member Tomas Daga told Reuters. China likely dethroned Japan as world's top auto exporter in 2023: China groupChina is estimated to have overtaken Japan as the world's largest auto exporter in 2023, the China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) said on Tuesday, as BYD , Chery and other domestic automakers made major strides overseas. Britain's Oxford Nanopore's shares sink after revenue warningShares in Britain's Oxford Nanopore dropped nearly 12% on Tuesday, after the sensing technology company issued a revenue warning, citing a slowdown in China and the Middle East, along with staggered purchases from large clients. Chinese auto brands to improve profitability with EV upgrades -UBSChinese auto brands are set for better profitability in 2024 despite intensifying competition in the world's largest auto market, UBS analysts said on Tuesday, thanks to upgrades they have been making in their electric vehicle (EV) product mix. China satellite launch prompts Taiwan attack alert ahead of pivotal voteTaiwan's government issued an air raid alert on Tuesday, saying a Chinese rocket carrying a satellite had flown over its southern airspace, which Taiwan's foreign minister described as part of a pattern of harassment days before a pivotal election. Gotham City accounting queries wipe $3.83 billion off Grifols valueShares in Grifols fell by 30% on Tuesday, wiping nearly $3 billion off its market value, after hedge fund Gotham City Research questioned its accounting, prompting the Spanish drugmaker to "categorically" deny any wrongdoing.
